Reviews.Title: I hate this camera
Reviews.Author: E. Rosen
Reviews.Content: This is my least favorite digi camera I have yet owned.  The controls take many shuffles and button pushes to change the flash or macro settings, so if you go back and forth often, you'll be wasting tons of time.  About 1/2 of the pictures it takes aer out of focus because the auto focus takes FOREVER to kick in and if you don't hold the button down long enough, it takes a quicker picture, but one that's totally blurry.  To refocus takes a good 5-10 seconds, so you can't take any pictures quickly in succession, or the subsequent ones will be blurry.  I've learned to work around it's pain in the rear-ness and most of the pictures are fine, but it's a real time waster and I still usually take double pics of each shot in case it acts up.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: stacy
Reviews.Content: recently bought this camera and i am perfectly happy. the price was great and operating is a breeze. the pictures are clear and prints beautifully.

Reviews.Title: very nice for the price
Reviews.Author: I shouldn't of been so cheap!!!
Reviews.Content: Apparently cameras,  like TV's have come a long way. I Bought this to replace (2) 10 year old digital camers I had and paid $200-250 a piece for.  This thing for $65 blows them away.  No complaints at all,  very nice camera.

Reviews.Title: no  regrets
Reviews.Author: Tasha Daley
Reviews.Content: Its a nice camera, I like the clarity of the photos. I bought this because my other camera was too big.

Reviews.Title: GE J1455 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: RyanH1984
Reviews.Content: This is a good camera but don't try to photograph the moon up close. It won't focus on it and the only way to focus on the moon is to use digital zoom (which sucks). However, everything else is fine, stars, trees, flowers, snow, etc.

Reviews.Title: gift
Reviews.Author: A. Peterson "lovereading"
Reviews.Content: I got it for my 16 yr old for Christmas, it takes video too, which he likes to take of him skateboarding

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera, iffy battery charger.
Reviews.Author: Morris M. Bond
Reviews.Content: This is my first digital camera, and this one seems to work fine.  The only problem I've had is the battery charger.  The light on the charger seems to turn green (indicating a full charge) arbitrarily.  I have to shake the charger with the battery in it, and maybe plug it into the wall upside down to get the indicator light to work properly.  Even so, I check the battery voltage to make sure it has a full charge of 4.1 to 4.2 volts before putting it back into the camera.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Tanya Brekke
Reviews.Content: For an inexpensive camera, this is GREAT.  Great quality and pictures.  Had issues with it not working in the beginning and had to send it in to GE.  Turns out it has to have an 8G sd card or larger in order to work.  That would have been nice to know.

Reviews.Title: The camera I ordered doesn't seem to match the camera I got.
Reviews.Author: Paula
Reviews.Content: My mom's digital camera no longer works, so I ordered this one for her for Christmas. I wanted to get her a camera that was easy to use, inexpensive, that also included a large LCD screen.  The description SAYS this one has a 3 inch screen; however, the manual that came with it says it's a 2.7.  I measured it against my own camera, & sure enough- this screen is NOT a 3 inch screen.  The difference is not a big one, so it's not really a huge concern; but I don't like the fact that the description was inaccurate.  The description also stated (as did the manual) that it used a rechargeable Lithium-ion battery, & that the charger was included.  Well, when I opened this one to check things out I found 2 AA alkaline batteries & no charger.  That, too, is not a big issue- but it IS inaccurate advertising.  One more (minor) complaint:  the little wrist lanyard that the manual claimed was supposed to be in the box is nowhere to be found.  I'm hoping I have one from an old camera of mine that I can put on it.Since I'm just getting this camera out of the box, I haven't really tested it out to see the quality of the pics it takes.  Maybe I'll add an update later.All in all, the camera I received (GE A1455) looks like a nifty little camera; but it's not EXACTLY what is described in the Amazon ad.  The proof will be in the pics, so we'll see!  Amazon's speed of service was EXCELLENT, as I waited a little late to order!  :)AFTER FURTHER READING...I realize now for sure that I didn't get the camera I ordered.  I ordered GE J1455; I RECEIVED GE A1455.  After thinking this over, had I known I would get a camera with a 2.7inch LCD (although at a decent price) I think I would have just picked one up @ Wal-Mart or somewhere like that.  I'm afraid to try to have this situation corrected, though, since it's so close to Christmas.  (My plans are to give mom the camera a few days before Christmas so she can use it for the pics during the holidays.

Reviews.Title: Wow...I love it
Reviews.Author: Bira "bira"
Reviews.Content: Its very good camera from GE. I had another camera from GE, this is second one purchased as gift on sale. It has rechargeable battery which is good for the price and the pictures quality is very good. I definitely recommend this.

Reviews.Title: GE digital camera lots of fun
Reviews.Author: Bootsie
Reviews.Content: This camera so much fun, easy to use, easy to down load.  A nice, compact size to put in your purse.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: It was brand new and still in the box. I love it! It's exactly what I wanted and in a great color.

Reviews.Title: GE J1455 Camera
Reviews.Author: Augusta County Serv Auth "ACSA Water"
Reviews.Content: We purchased this to use in our safety program.  The flexibility the camera has to work in vastly different lighting conditions is terrific.  The zoom feature helps focus on details being photographed without losing the message because of too much "extra" being included in the picture.  We are very pleased so far.

ProductInfo.Features:
14MP Digital Camera with 5x optical zoom and 5.7x digital zoom
3.0 Inch vibrant LCD with auto brightness
18MB internal memory with SD/SDHC card support up to 16GB
Face detection, in camera red eye removal, image stabilization, smile detection, blink detection
Lithium-ion rechargeable battery
ProductInfo.Name: GE J1455 14MP Digital Camera with 5X Optical Zoom and 3.0-Inch LCD with Auto Brightness (Black)
